name: Shutter Island, 2010
text: An American detective thriller directed by Martin Scorsese based on the novel of the same name by Dennis Lehane, released on February 19, 2010 in the United States. The screenplay adaptation of the novel was produced by Laeta Kalogridis. This is the fourth collaboration between Scorsese and actor Leonardo DiCaprio.

name: Knockin' On Heaven's Door
text: By the will of fate, two absolute opposites, quiet Rudy and sloppy Martin, find themselves in the same hospital room. After learning the disappointing forecasts, the friends decide to use the last few days to the fullest

name: Fight club, 1999
text: An insurance worker destroys the routine of his prosperous life. A cult drama based on the book by Chuck Palahniuk.
